message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.DC, cs.DL 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - The paper focuses on word embeddings, which is a popular approach in natural language processing (NLP) and falls under the scope of cs.CL. 
2. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper proposes a scalable approach to train word embeddings using distributed architectures, which is a common topic in machine learning and falls under the scope of cs.LG. 
3. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The paper mentions that word embeddings have been widely popular in numerous tasks in information retrieval and text mining, which suggests that the paper may fall under the scope of cs.IR. 
4. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The paper proposes a distributed approach to train word embeddings, which falls under the scope of cs.DC. 
5. cs.DL (Deep Learning) - The paper discusses the performance improvement in NLP benchmarks using models trained by their distributed procedure, which suggests that the paper may fall under the scope of cs.DL.
